projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
With the release of Node.js 12, it is time to update out Node.js builds references on Travis:

https://github.com/search?l=&q=node_js%3A+user%3Aappcelerator&ref=advsearch&type=Code&utf8=âœ“

We should be using 10 (currently supported), 12 (now latest stable), and 13 (next unstable)
fields.summary: Tooling: Update versions of node.js in use on Travis
